name: Mastermind - Break the Code!
description:
Mastermind is a classic mind game: a secret code is given, and you must figure it out using guesses and the hints provided on the puzzle.

The game play is easy to adopt, and more addictive than ever in this great looking code breaking game


*** HOW TO PLAY ***
The goal is to guess your opponent's code in the fewest tries possible. There are 6-8 colors to choose from.
Your objective is to logically guess the combination of color in the correct sequence.
You have 8 chances to guess it correct
Tap the colored peg you want to place into the board
Tap on the chosen peg on the board if you want to replace it with another peg
If you are satisfied with the combination you have made, press the "OK" button on the right
When you finished you combination, check the small pegs on the board's right side.
* Black - right color, right space
* White - right color, wrong space
* Empty - wrong color, wrong space
If you fail to guess the code in 8 tries, you lose and the correct pegs are revealed at the top of the game board.

The order of the result pegs has no correlation with the order of the guess pegs. The result pegs tell you how many guess pegs are correct, but not which ones.

SCORING:
You get more points for less guesses, more balls, and more pegs. You get less points for using a hint.


Can you crack the code?
